label: None
description: Summarizes jobs reported to the ACCESS allocations service (excludes non-ACCESS usage of the resource).

label: Allocation
description: A funded project that is allowed to run jobs on resources.

label: Field of Science
description: The field of science indicated on the allocation request pertaining to the running jobs.

label: Gateway
description: A science gateway is a portal set up to aid submiting jobs to resources.

label: Grant Type
description: A categorization of the projects/allocations.

label: Job Size
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on the number of cores used by each job.

label: Job Wait Time
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on the total linear time each job waited.

label: Job Wall Time
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on the total linear time each job took to execute.

label: NSF Directorate
description: The NSF directorate of the field of science indiciated on the allocation request pertaining to the running jobs.

label: Node Count
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on node count.

label: PI
description: The principal investigator of a project.

label: PI Institution
description: Organizations that have PIs with allocations.

label: PI Institution Country
description: The country of the institution of the PI of the project associated with compute jobs.

label: PI Institution State
description: The location of the institution of the PI of the project associated with the compute jobs.

label: Parent Science
description: The parent of the field of science indiciated on the allocation request pertaining to the running jobs.

label: Queue
description: Queue pertains to the low level job queues on each resource.

label: Resource
description: A resource is a remote computer that can run jobs.

label: Resource Type
description: A categorization of resources into by their general capabilities.

label: Service Provider
description: A service provider is an institution that hosts resources.

label: System Username
description: The specific system username of the users who ran jobs.

label: User
description: A person who is on a PIs allocation, hence able run jobs on resources.

label: User Institution
description: Organizations that have users with allocations.

label: User Institution Country
description: The name of the country of the institution of the person who ran the compute job.

label: User Institution State
description: The location of the institution of the person who ran the compute job.

label: User NSF Status
description: Categorization of the users who ran jobs.
